sentences.en: After its compaction into rock, mudstone has lower porosity and its sealing capability becomes better.
sentences.cn: 泥岩经压实固结成岩后,其孔隙度变小,从开始具有封闭能力,到封闭能力逐渐变好.

sentences.en: Cretaceous sandstone and Eogene mudstone are the main reservoir and caprock.
sentences.cn: 油气从油气田东部注入,由东向西运移并差异聚集,依次形成凝析气藏、带油环凝析气藏和挥发性油藏.

sentences.en: In the drilling operation, wellbore stability mostly occurs in the mudstone and shale section.
sentences.cn: 钻井工程中的井壁稳定问题大多发生在泥页岩井段.

sentences.en: In this paper, effect of uranium substance on the mudstone pyrogenation was studied by hydrous pyrolysis.
sentences.cn: 采用加水热模拟实验方法, 考察了含铀物质对泥岩样品热解生烃产物的影响.

sentences.en: It is vital difference for the changes of porosity and permeability between sandstone and mudstone.
sentences.cn: 砂泥岩孔隙度、渗透率的变化存在很大差异.

sentences.en: It passes mainly through the purple -- color soft sandrock and mudstone in Triassic or Dyas Systems.
sentences.cn: 隧道主要通过三迭系、二迭系 紫红色 软质砂岩、泥岩岩层.

sentences.en: Many serious turbidite sand bodies and huge thick dead color mudstone are developed in the depression.
sentences.cn: 洼陷内在沙三段发育有多套浊积砂体和巨厚暗色泥岩,油气成藏条件十分优越.

sentences.en: Mudstone can transport water with poor permeability.
sentences.cn: 泥岩可以疏导地层水,只是疏导能力差而已.

sentences.en: Oil source rock is the dark mudstone in Es 1 Member , which deposited in a saline environment.
sentences.cn: 油源为本地咸水环境下形成的沙一段暗色泥岩.

sentences.en: Organic materials were deposited in sequences of sandstone and mudstone, which were then covered by limestones as the environment became progressively more marine.
sentences.cn: 无机矿物质按照砂岩和泥岩的顺序沉积着，并随着周围的自然环境演变为海洋性，由石灰石覆盖在了最上层。

sentences.en: Rocks sculptured by erosion, richly tinted mudstone hills and canyons, luminous sand dunes, and lush oases populate Death Valley National Park.
sentences.cn: 在死亡谷国家公园里，有着腐蚀而成的岩石雕刻、富有着色泥岩的山丘和峡谷、发光的沙丘和郁郁葱葱的绿洲。

sentences.en: The main rocks are sandstone, mudstone and muddy siltstone or silty mudstone.
sentences.cn: 岩石类型主要有砂岩 、 泥岩及泥-粉砂过渡岩类.

sentences.en: The mudstone deposited in this time is the favorable source rock.
sentences.cn: 同时,该层序内沉积的暗色泥岩也是有利的烃源岩.

sentences.en: The preparation of red cement using activated red mudstone has been studied.
sentences.cn: 介绍利用活化红泥岩制备红色水泥的研究.

sentences.en: The seal rocks are developed widely, and the Neocene marine mudstone is the regional seal.
sentences.cn: 盖层发育广泛, 区域性盖层是新近系海相泥岩和渐新统泥岩.

sentences.en: The tools were located in a series of gravel, sand, and mudstone beds and included picklike tools, basic hand axes, and broken pieces of stone left behind in the tool-making process.
sentences.cn: 这些工具遗迹位于一系列的砾石、沙滩和泥岩床上，包括类似镐的工具、基本手持工具和在工具制造过程中残留的碎石片等。

sentences.en: The variety of these mudstone and shales is very complex in lacustrinehigh - frequency cycle.
sentences.cn: 这些泥岩和页岩在湖相高频旋回中的变化相当复杂.

sentences.en: This paper studies the problems in mudstone slope projects in Nanning Basin.
sentences.cn: 本文以南宁泥岩盆地内的泥岩边坡出现的工程问题开展研究.

trans.tran_en: a dark grey clay rock similar to shale but with the lamination less well developed
